prompts: Create a powerful Normal-type Pokemon that embodies strength and nurturing behaviors.
Show me a Pokemon with a motherly figure, featuring a baby in its pouch.
Design a Pokemon that is both fierce in battle and protective of its young.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in grassy environments and has a large, sturdy body.
Generate a Pokemon that blends a caring personality with formidable combat skills.
Make a Pokemon that has a unique pouch feature, symbolizing its nurturing nature.
Give me a Pokemon with brown fur and a strong build, perfect for a forest habitat.

distinctive_features: Distinctive head shape with large ears
Baby Kangaskhan visible in the pouch

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Balanced, focusing on both physical strength and defense
